value.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
value.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

value.title: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure

value.title: Protect your virtual machine settings with Azure Automation State Configuration
value.excerpt: Learn how to protect your virtual machine settings with Azure Automation State Configuration

value.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit
value.excerpt: Get started with Q# programming by building a quantum random number generator.

value.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

value.title: React to state changes in your Azure services by using Event Grid
value.excerpt: Build a serverless application architecture, automate your operations, and integrate applications by handling Azure events with Event Grid.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: Remotely monitor and control devices with Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Create an IoT Hub device app, and a back-end service app. As a scenario, we use the monitoring, and controlling, of the temperature and humidity of a cheese cave.

value.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll guide you through creating a WebJob in the same project as an existing Web App and automating tasks with WebJobs.

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
value.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: Transcribe speech input to text
value.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
value.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
value.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

value.title: Automate tasks in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Scripting repetitive tasks in Azure SQL for regular maintenance jobs and multi-instance administration. Automation of error and resource alerts. Configuration of notifications for failures.

topItems.title: Configure automatic deployment for Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure Resource Manager templates for deploying Azure SQL resources.

topItems.title: Schedule tasks using SQL Server Agent
topItems.excerpt: Explore SQL automation for scheduled tasks and automatic alerts for SQL Server and Managed Instance. Configure extended event sessions for tracing activities.

topItems.title: Manage Azure PaaS resources using automated methods
topItems.excerpt: Explore SQL automation for Azure SQL Database and Open Source databases. Configure elastic jobs and Azure Policy.

value.title: Cloud administration basics
value.excerpt:
Learn about the basics of the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types of services, in preparation for real-world cloud practice on Azure.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about the history of the cloud, and how it was built
Know the major cloud providers and cloud types
Understand what types of resources are available through the cloud
Recognize cloud service modules
Know the economic benefits of the cloud
Understand digital identity, and how digital identities can be shared and secured

In partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

topItems.title: Provision and manage cloud services
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the different types of resources available on the cloud and the technology behind how they work.

topItems.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about digital identities and how they can be managed and synchronized within an organization.

value.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI in government
value.excerpt: It is imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in government. In this learning path, you will be provided with guidelines to assist in setting up principles and a governance model in your government organization. You will also be provided with resources, best practices, and tools.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI in government
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for governments, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the public sector.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Identify principles and practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: It is imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in business. In this learning path, you will be provided with guidelines to assist in setting up principles and a governance model in your organization. You will also be provided with resources, best practices, and tools.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for organizations, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the enterprise.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn the concepts of event processing and streaming data and how this applies to Azure Stream Analytics. You will then set up a stream analytics job to stream data, and learn how to manage and monitor a running job.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Planning Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you see how to plan for a deployment of SAP solutions on Azure. You will also consider the preparation required for migrating SAP workloads to Azure.

topItems.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

topItems.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

topItems.title: Prepare to migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module provides details on the important steps prior to deploying SAP workloads to Azure: project preparation and planning, pilot, non-production, production preparation, go live, and post production.

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the artificial intelligence algorithms in the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in images.

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Quantum computing fundamentals
value.excerpt: Intrigued by quantum computing but don't know where to start? This learning path helps prepare you for this exciting next generation of computing.

topItems.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit
topItems.excerpt: Get started with Q# programming by building a quantum random number generator.

topItems.title: Explore the key concepts of quantum computing by using Q#
topItems.excerpt: Learn the fundamental concepts of quantum computing by using the different tools of Q# and the Quantum Development Kit.

topItems.title: Solve optimization problems by using quantum-inspired optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how quantum-inspired algorithms mimic quantum physics to solve difficult optimization problems.

value.title: Run Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: This learning path augments existing knowledge around the deployment methodologies for SAP workloads in Azure, focusing on Azure Marketplace and custom images using the Azure portal, Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates, and Azure PowerShell cmdlets.

topItems.title: Implement Azure VM-based SAP solutions
topItems.excerpt: Implement Azure VM-based SAP solutions

topItems.title: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure

topItems.title: Maintain Azure for SAP workloads
topItems.excerpt: Maintain Azure for SAP workloads

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Administer and manage Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine remotely
value.excerpt: You’ll be able to select and use suitable tools and techniques to remotely manage Windows IaaS VMs, and restrict administrative connections to those VMs.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in Government that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in manufacturing that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.
